author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sleep Number Announces Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.52
text:
April 18 (Reuters) - Sleep Number Corp:
* Q1 SALES $389 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $396.7 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.56 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* REITERATES FULL-YEAR 2018 EARNINGS OUTLOOK OF $1.70 TO $2.00 PER DILUTED SHARE
* SEES MID- TO HIGH-SINGLE DIGIT SALES GROWTH FOR 2018
* ANTICIPATES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES TO BE APPROXIMATELY $50 MILLION
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.85, REVENUE VIEW $1.53 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
